greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k)= Sum_{c in C(n,k)}gcd(c) where C(n,k) is the set of all k-tuples of positive integers whose elements sum to n.
comment: C(n,k) counted by A007318(n-1,k-1) are also called compositions of n of size k (see A181842).
maple: with(combstruct): # By generating the objects, very inefficient.
a181847_row := proc(n) local k,L,l,R,comp; R := NULL;
for k from 1 to n do
T := (n, k) -> add(phi(d)*binomial(n/d-1, k-1), d = divisors(n)):
seq(seq(T(n, k), k=1..n), n=1..10); # _Peter Luschny_, Aug 27 2019
program: DivisorTriangle(euler_phi, lambda n,k: binomial(n-1, k-1), 10) # _Peter Luschny_, Aug 27 2019
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Dec 07 2010
